note: Born in N. Ireland, now living in Australia. Into bush camping - see https://slowcamping.com.au/ and a new holistic view of how we integrate with our natural environment. Professional human-centred designer, service designer (MA Design Futures).

fields.name: Human-centred design
fields.value: 20+ Years experience in UX, HCD, working across Government, Corporate sectors. See https://designfutures.com.au/

fields.name: Bush camping
fields.value: Enthusiastic bush camper, RVer. Wants to see a new respect for the bush. See https://slowcamping.com.au /

fields.name: Australia
fields.value: Migrant to Australia. Now resident on the land of the Darkinjung people with respect to their elders past and present.

fields.name: Nature
fields.value: Bird watcher, amateur naturalist. In awe of the incredible Australian landscape.
